plot: Brooke is firmly resolved to continue her entanglement with Ridge. Ridge is in a mood over Margo's decline of his invitation and berates Rocco for a slight mistake. Bill decides to start a fashion magazine and he's decided to ask Caroline and Margo to be a part of it. Brooke invites Ridge to attend the Logan family's tree-trimming party and Ridge asks her if she would accompany him to Switzerland. She happily accepts.—A. Nonny Mouse
